participant_1.name: Megan
participant_1.personality: Megan is a passionate and creative individual who loves to express herself through music. She has a warm and friendly demeanor.
participant_1.background: i grew up in the industry. we spent summers ring at national parks. i am a country music singer. my favorite band is rascal flats.

participant_2.name: Mike
participant_2.personality: Mike is a down-to-earth and hardworking family man who values time spent with his loved ones. He has a great sense of humor and enjoys simple pleasures.
participant_2.background: my wife and kids are the best. i am a plumber. i love going to the park with my three children and my wife. i have three children. my favorite ice cream flavor is chocolate.
